words.translation: Blessed is He|Who|sent down|the Criterion|upon|His slave|that he may be|to the worlds|a warner

translations.1: Tabaarakal lazee nazzalal Furqaana 'alaa 'abdihee li-yakoona lil'aalameena nazeera
translations.2: Tabaraka allathee nazzala alfurqana AAala AAabdihi liyakoona lilAAalameena natheeran

words.translation: The One Who|to Him (belongs)|(the) dominion|(of) the heavens|and the earth|and not|He has taken|a son|and not|He has|for Him|a partner|in|the dominion|and He (has) created|every|thing|and determined it|(with) determination

translations.1: Allazee lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal ardi Wa-lam yattakhiz waladanw Wa-lam yakul lahoo shareekun filmulki Wa-khalaqa kulla shai'in faqaddarahoo taqdeeraa
translations.2: Allathee lahu mulku alssamawati waalardi walam yattakhith waladan walam yakun lahu shareekun fee almulki wakhalaqa kulla shayin faqaddarahu taqdeeran

words.translation: Yet they have taken|besides Him|besides Him|gods|not|they create|anything|while they|are created|and not|they possess|for themselves|any harm|and not|any benefit|and not|they control|death|and not|life|and not|resurrection

translations.1: Wattakhazoo min dooniheee aalihatal laa yakhluqoona shai'anw Wa-hum yukhlaqoona Wa-laa yamlikoona li-anfusihim darranw Wa-laa naf'anw Wa-laa yamlikoona mawtanw Wa-laa hayaatanw Wa-laa nushooraa
translations.2: Waittakhathoo min doonihi alihatan la yakhluqoona shayan wahum yukhlaqoona wala yamlikoona lianfusihim darran wala nafAAan wala yamlikoona mawtan wala hayatan wala nushooran

words.translation: And say|those who|disbelieve|Not|this|(is) but|a lie|he invented it|and helped him|at it|people|other|But verily|they (have) produced|an injustice|and a lie

translations.1: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafarooo in haazaaa illaaa ifkunif taraahu Wa-a'aanahoo 'alaihi qawmun aakharoona faqad jaaa'oo zulmanw Wa-zooraa
translations.2: Waqala allatheena kafaroo in hatha illa ifkun iftarahu waaAAanahu AAalayhi qawmun akharoona faqad jaoo thulman wazooran

words.translation: And they say|Tales|(of) the former people|which he has had written|and they|are dictated|to him|morning|and evening

translations.1: Wa-qaalooo asaateerul awwaleenak tatabahaa fahiya tumlaa 'alaihi bukratanw Wa-aseelaa
translations.2: Waqaloo asateeru alawwaleena iktatabaha fahiya tumla AAalayhi bukratan waaseelan

words.translation: Say|Has sent it down|the One Who|knows|the secret|in|the heavens|and the earth|Indeed He|is|Oft-Forgiving|Most Merciful

translations.1: Qul anzalhul lazee ya'lamus sirra fis samaawaati wal-ard; innahoo kaana Ghafoorar Raheemaa
translations.2: Qul anzalahu allathee yaAAlamu alssirra fee alssamawati waalardi innahu kana ghafooran raheeman

words.translation: And they say|Why does|this|Messenger|eat|[the] food|and walk|in|the markets|Why not|is sent down|to him|an Angel|then he be|with him|a warner

translations.1: Wa-qaaloo maa-li haazar Rasooli ya'kulut ta'aama Wa-yamshee fil aswaaq; law-laaa unzila ilaihi malakun fa-yakoona ma'ahoo nazeeraa
translations.2: Waqaloo mali hatha alrrasooli yakulu alttaAAama wayamshee fee alaswaqi lawla onzila ilayhi malakun fayakoona maAAahu natheeran

words.translation: Or|is delivered|to him|a treasure|or|is|for him|a garden|he may eat|from it|And say|the wrongdoers|Not|you follow|but|a man|bewitched

translations.1: Aw yulqaaa ilaihi kanzun aw takoonu lahoo jannatuien ya'kulu minhaa; Wa-qaalaz zaalimoona in tattabi'oona illaa rajulan mas-hooraa
translations.2: Aw yulqa ilayhi kanzun aw takoonu lahu jannatun yakulu minha waqala alththalimoona in tattabiAAoona illa rajulan mashooran

words.translation: See|how|they set forth|for you|the similitudes|but they have gone astray|so not|they are able (to find)|a way

translations.1: Unzur kaifa daraboo lakal amsaala fadalloo falaa yastatee'oona sabeelaa
translations.2: Onthur kayfa daraboo laka alamthala fadalloo fala yastateeAAoona sabeelan

words.translation: Blessed is He|Who|if|He willed|(could have) made|for you|better|than|that|gardens|flow|from|underneath it|the rivers|and He (could) make|for you|palaces

translations.1: Tabaarakal lazeee in shaaa'a ja'ala laka khairan min zaalika jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru Wa-yaj'al laka qusooraa
translations.2: Tabaraka allathee in shaa jaAAala laka khayran min thalika jannatin tajree min tahtiha alanharu wayajAAal laka qusooran

words.translation: Nay|they deny|the Hour|and We have prepared|for (those) who|deny|the Hour|a Blazing Fire

translations.1: Bal kazzaboo bis-Saa'ati Wa-a'tadnaa liman kazzaba bis-Saa'ati sa'eeraa
translations.2: Bal kaththaboo bialssaAAati waaAAtadna liman kaththaba bialssaAAati saAAeeran

words.translation: When|it sees them|from|a place|far|they will hear|its|raging|and roaring

translations.1: Izaa ra'at-hum min makaanin ba'eedin sami'oo lahaa taghaiyuzanw Wa-zafeeraa
translations.2: Itha raathum min makanin baAAeedin samiAAoo laha taghayyuthan wazafeeran

words.translation: And when|they are thrown|thereof|(in) a place|narrow|bound in chains|they will call|there|(for) destruction

translations.1: Wa-izaaa ulqoo minhaa makaanan daiyyiqam muqar-raneena da'aw hunaalika thuboora
translations.2: Waitha olqoo minha makanan dayyiqan muqarraneena daAAaw hunalika thubooran

words.translation: (Do) not|call|this day|(for) destruction|one|but call|(for) destructions|many

translations.1: Laa tad'ul yawma thubooranw waahidanw wad'oo thubooran kaseeraa
translations.2: La tadAAoo alyawma thubooran wahidan waodAAoo thubooran katheeran

words.translation: Say|Is that|better|or|Garden|(of) Eternity|which|is promised|(to) the righteous|It will be|for them|a reward|and destination

translations.1: Qul azaalika khairun am Jannatul khuldil latee wu'idal muttaqoon; kaanat lahum jazaaa'anw Wa-maseeraa
translations.2: Qul athalika khayrun am jannatu alkhuldi allatee wuAAida almuttaqoona kanat lahum jazaan wamaseeran

words.translation: For them|therein|(is) whatever|they wish|they will abide forever|It is|on|your Lord|a promise|requested

translations.1: Lahum feehaa maa yashaaa'oona khaalideen; kaana 'alaa Rabbika wa'dan mas'oolaa
translations.2: Lahum feeha ma yashaoona khalideena kana AAala rabbika waAAdan masoolan

words.translation: And (the) Day|He will gather them|and what|they worship|besides Allah|besides Allah|besides Allah|and He will say|Did you|[you] mislead|My slaves|these|or|they|went astray|(from) the way

translations.1: Wa-Yawma yahshuruhum Wa-maa ya'budoona min doonil laahi fa-yaqoolu 'a-antum adlaltum 'ibaadee haaa'ulaaa'i am hum dallus sabeel
translations.2: Wayawma yahshuruhum wama yaAAbudoona min dooni Allahi fayaqoolu aantum adlaltum AAibadee haolai am hum dalloo alssabeela

words.translation: They say|Glory be to You|Not|it was proper|it was proper|for us|that|we take|besides You|besides You|any|protectors|But|You gave them comforts|and their forefathers|until|they forgot|the Message|and became|a people|ruined

translations.1: Qaaloo Subhaanaka maa kaana yanbaghee lanaaa an nattakhiza min doonika min awliyaaa'a Wa-laakin matta'tahum Wa-aabaaa'ahum hattaa nasooz zikra Wa-kaanoo qawman booraa
translations.2: Qaloo subhanaka ma kana yanbaghee lana an nattakhitha min doonika min awliyaa walakin mattaAAtahum waabaahum hatta nasoo alththikra wakanoo qawman booran

words.translation: So verily|they deny you|in what|you say|so not|you are able|(to) avert|and not|(to) help|And whoever|does wrong|among you|We will make him taste|a punishment|great

translations.1: Faqad kazzabookum bimaa taqooloona famaa tastatee'oona sarfanw Wa-laa nasraa; Wa-many yazlim minkum nuziqhu 'azaaban kabeeraa
translations.2: Faqad kaththabookum bima taqooloona fama tastateeAAoona sarfan wala nasran waman yathlim minkum nuthiqhu AAathaban kabeeran

words.translation: And not|We sent|before you|any|Messengers|but|indeed they|[surely] ate|food|and walked|in|the markets|And We have made|some of you|for others|a trial|will you have patience|And is|your Lord|All-Seer

translations.1: Wa-maaa arsalnaa qablaka minal mursaleena illaaa innahum la-ya'kuloonat ta'aama Wa-yamshoona fil aswaaq; Wa-ja'alnaa ba'dakum liba'din fitnatan atasbiroon; Wa-kaana Rabbuka Baseera
translations.2: Wama arsalna qablaka mina almursaleena illa innahum layakuloona alttaAAama wayamshoona fee alaswaqi wajaAAalna baAAdakum libaAAdin fitnatan atasbiroona wakana rabbuka baseeran

words.translation: And said|those who|(do) not|expect|(the) meeting with Us|Why not|are sent down|to us|the Angels|or|we see|our Lord|Indeed|they have become arrogant|within|themselves|and (become) insolent|(with) insolence|great

translations.1: Wa-qaalal lazeena laa yarjoona liqaaa'anaa law-laaa unzila 'alainal malaaa'ikatu aw naraa Rabbanaa; laqadis takbaroo feee anfusihim Wa-'ataw 'utuwwan kabeeraa
translations.2: Waqala allatheena la yarjoona liqaana lawla onzila AAalayna almalaikatu aw nara rabbana laqadi istakbaroo fee anfusihim waAAataw AAutuwwan kabeeran

words.translation: (The) Day|they see|the Angels|no|glad tidings|(will be) that Day|for the criminals|and they will say|A partition|forbidden

translations.1: Yawma yarawnal malaaa-'ikata laa bushraa Yawmaizin lil-mujrimeena Wa-yaqooloona hijran mahjooraa
translations.2: Yawma yarawna almalaikata la bushra yawmaithin lilmujrimeena wayaqooloona hijran mahjooran

words.translation: And We will proceed|to|whatever|they did|of|(the) deed(s)|and We will make them|(as) dust|dispersed

translations.1: Wa qadimnaaa ilaa maa 'amiloo min 'amalin faja'alnaahuhabaaa'an manthooraa
translations.2: Waqadimna ila ma AAamiloo min AAamalin fajaAAalnahu habaan manthooran

words.translation: (The) companions|(of) Paradise|that Day|(will be in) a better|abode|and a better|resting-place

translations.1: As-haabul jannati yawma'izin khairun mustaqar-ranw Wa-ahsanu maqeela
translations.2: Ashabu aljannati yawmaithin khayrun mustaqarran waahsanu maqeelan

words.translation: And (the) Day|will split open|the heavens|with the clouds|and (will be) sent down|the Angels|descending

translations.1: Wa-Yawma tashaqqaqus samaaa'u bilghamaami Wa-nuzzilal malaaa'ikatu tanzeela
translations.2: Wayawma tashaqqaqu alssamao bialghamami wanuzzila almalaikatu tanzeelan

words.translation: The Sovereignty|that Day|(will be) truly|for the Most Gracious|And (it will) be|a Day|for|the disbelievers|difficult

translations.1: Almulku Yawma'izinil haqqu lir Rahmaan; Wa-kaana Yawman'alal kaafireena 'aseeraa
translations.2: Almulku yawmaithin alhaqqu lilrrahmani wakana yawman AAala alkafireena AAaseeran

words.translation: And (the) Day|will bite|the wrongdoer|[on]|his hands|he will say|O I wish!|I had taken|with|the Messenger|a way

translations.1: Wa-Yawma ya'adduz zaalimu 'alaa yadaihi yaqoolu yaa-laitanit takhaztu ma'ar Rasooli sabeelaa
translations.2: Wayawma yaAAaddu alththalimu AAala yadayhi yaqoolu ya laytanee ittakhathtu maAAa alrrasooli sabeelan

words.translation: O woe to me!|I wish|not|I had taken|that one|(as) a friend

translations.1: Yaa-wailataa laitanee lam attakhiz fulaanan khaleelaa
translations.2: Ya waylata laytanee lam attakhith fulanan khaleelan

words.translation: Verily|he led me astray|from|the Reminder|after|[when]|it (had) come to me|And is|the Shaitaan|to the man|a deserter

translations.1: Laqad adallanee 'aniz zikri ba'da iz jaaa'anee; Wa-kaanash Shaitaanu lil-insaani khazoolaa
translations.2: Laqad adallanee AAani alththikri baAAda ith jaanee wakana alshshaytanu lilinsani khathoolan

words.translation: And said|the Messenger|O my Lord!|Indeed|my people|took|this|the Quran|(as) a forsaken thing

translations.1: Wa-qaalar Rasoolu yaa-Rabbi inna qawmit takhazoo haazal Qur'aana mahjooraa
translations.2: Waqala alrrasoolu ya rabbi inna qawmee ittakhathoo hatha alqurana mahjooran

words.translation: And thus|We have made|for every|Prophet|an enemy|among|the criminals|But sufficient is|your Lord|(as) a Guide|and a Helper

translations.1: Wa-kazaalika ja'alnaa likulli Nabiyyin 'aduwwan minal mujrimeen; Wa-kafaa bi-Rabbika haadiyanw Wa-naseeraa
translations.2: Wakathalika jaAAalna likulli nabiyyin AAaduwwan mina almujrimeena wakafa birabbika hadiyan wanaseeran

words.translation: And said|those who|disbelieve|Why not|was revealed|to him|the Quran|all at once|all at once|Thus|that We may strengthen|thereby|your heart|and We have recited it|(with distinct) recitation

translations.1: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo law-laa nuzzila 'alaihil Qur'aanu jumlatanw waahidah; kazaalika linusabbita bihee fu'aadaka Wa-rattalnaahu tarteelaa
translations.2: Waqala allatheena kafaroo lawla nuzzila AAalayhi alquranu jumlatan wahidatan kathalika linuthabbita bihi fuadaka warattalnahu tarteelan

words.translation: And not|they come to you|with an example|but|We bring you|the truth|and (the) best|explanation

translations.1: Wa-laa ya'toonaka bi-masalin illaa ji'naaka bilhaqqi Wa-ahsana tafseeraa
translations.2: Wala yatoonaka bimathalin illa jinaka bialhaqqi waahsana tafseeran

words.translation: Those who|will be gathered|on|their faces|to|Hell|those|(are the) worst|(in) position|and most astray|(from the) way

translations.1: Allazeena yuhsharoona 'alaa wujoohihim ilaa jahannama ulaaa'ika sharrun makaananw Wa-adallu sabeelaa
translations.2: Allatheena yuhsharoona AAala wujoohihim ila jahannama olaika sharrun makanan waadallu sabeelan

words.translation: And verily|We gave|Musa|the Scripture|and We appointed|with him|his brother|Harun|(as) an assistant

translations.1: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba Wa-ja'alnaa ma'ahooo akhaahu Haaroona wazeeraa
translations.2: Walaqad atayna moosa alkitaba wajaAAalna maAAahu akhahu haroona wazeeran

words.translation: Then We said|Go both of you|to|the people|those who|have denied|Our Signs|Then We destroyed them|(with) destruction

translations.1: Faqulnaz habaaa ilal qawmil lazeena kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa fadammarnaahum tadmeeraa
translations.2: Faqulna ithhaba ila alqawmi allatheena kaththaboo biayatina fadammarnahum tadmeeran

words.translation: And (the) people|(of) Nuh|when|they denied|the Messengers|We drowned them|and We made them|for mankind|a sign|And We have prepared|for the wrongdoers|a punishment|painful

translations.1: Wa-qawma Noohin lammaa kazzabur Rusula aghraqnaahum Wa-ja'alnaahum linnaasi Aayatanw Wa-a'tadnaa lizzaalimeena 'azaaban aleemaa
translations.2: Waqawma noohin lamma kaththaboo alrrusula aghraqnahum wajaAAalnahum lilnnasi ayatan waaAAtadna lilththalimeena AAathaban aleeman

words.translation: And Ad|and Thamud|and (the) dwellers|(of) Ar-rass|and generations|between|that|many

translations.1: Wa-'Aadanw Wa-Samooda Wa-As-haabar Rassi Wa-quroonan baina zaalika katheeraa
translations.2: WaAAadan wathamooda waashaba alrrassi waquroonan bayna thalika katheeran

words.translation: And each|We have set forth|for him|the examples|and each|We destroyed|(with) destruction

translations.1: Wa-kullan darabnaa lahul amsaala Wa-kullan tabbarnaa tatbeera
translations.2: Wakullan darabna lahu alamthala wakullan tabbarna tatbeeran

words.translation: And verily|they have come|upon|the town|which|was showered|(with) a rain|(of) evil|Then do not|they [were]|see it|Nay|they are|not|expecting|Resurrection

translations.1: Wa-laqad ataw 'alal qaryatil lateee umtirat mataras saw'; afalam yakoonoo yarawnahaa; bal kaanoo laa yarjoona nushooraa
translations.2: Walaqad ataw AAala alqaryati allatee omtirat matara alssawi afalam yakoonoo yarawnaha bal kanoo la yarjoona nushooran

words.translation: And when|they see you|not|they take you|except|(in) mockery|Is this|the one whom|Allah has sent|Allah has sent|(as) a Messenger

translations.1: Wa-izaa ra-awka ien yattakhizoonaka illaa huzuwan ahaazal lazee ba'asal laahu Rasoolaa
translations.2: Waitha raawka in yattakhithoonaka illa huzuwan ahatha allathee baAAatha Allahu rasoolan

words.translation: He would have almost|He would have almost|[surely] misled us|from|our gods|if not|that|we had been steadfast|to them|And soon|will know|when|they will see|the punishment|who|(is) more astray|(from the) way

translations.1: In kaada la-yudillunaa 'an aalihatinaa law-laaa an sabarnaa 'alaihaa; Wa-sawfa ya'lamoona heena yarawnal 'azaaba man adallu sabeela
translations.2: In kada layudilluna AAan alihatina lawla an sabarna AAalayha wasawfa yaAAlamoona heena yarawna alAAathaba man adallu sabeelan

words.translation: Have you seen|(one) who|takes|(as) his god|his own desire|Then would you|be|over him|a guardian

translations.1: Ara'aita manit takhaza ilaahahoo hawaahu afa-anta takoonu 'alaihi wakeelaa
translations.2: Araayta mani ittakhatha ilahahu hawahu afaanta takoonu AAalayhi wakeelan

words.translation: Or|do you think|that|most of them|hear|or|understand|Not|they|(are) except|like cattle|Nay|they|(are) more astray|(from the) way

translations.1: Am tahsabu anna aksarahum yasma'oona aw ya'qiloon; in hum illaa kal-an'aami bal hum adallu sabeelaa
translations.2: Am tahsabu anna aktharahum yasmaAAoona aw yaAAqiloona in hum illa kaalanAAami bal hum adallu sabeelan

words.translation: Do you not|see|[to]|your Lord|how|He extends|the shadow|And if|He willed|surely He (could) have made it|stationary|Then|We made|the sun|for it|an indication

translations.1: Alam tara ilaa Rabbika kaifa maddaz zilla Wa-law shaaa'a la-ja'alahoo saakinan thumma ja'alnash shamsa 'alaihi daleelaa
translations.2: Alam tara ila rabbika kayfa madda alththilla walaw shaa lajaAAalahu sakinan thumma jaAAalna alshshamsa AAalayhi daleelan

words.translation: Then|We withdraw it|to Us|a withdrawal|gradual

translations.1: Thumma qabadnaahu ilainaa qabdany yaseeraa
translations.2: Thumma qabadnahu ilayna qabdan yaseeran

words.translation: And He|(is) the One Who|made|for you|the night|(as) a covering|and the sleep|a rest|and made|the day|a resurrection

translations.1: Wa-Huwal lazee ja'ala lakumul laila libaasanw wannawma subaatanw Wa-ja'alan nahaara nushooraa
translations.2: Wahuwa allathee jaAAala lakumu allayla libasan waalnnawma subatan wajaAAala alnnahara nushooran

words.translation: And He|(is) the One Who|sends|the winds|(as) glad tidings|before|before|His Mercy|and We send down|from|the sky|water|pure

translations.1: Wa-Huwal lazeee arsalar riyaaha bushran baina yadai rahmatih; Wa-anzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'an tahooraa
translations.2: Wahuwa allathee arsala alrriyaha bushran bayna yaday rahmatihi waanzalna mina alssamai maan tahooran

words.translation: That We may give life|thereby|(to) a land|dead|and We give drink|thereof|(to those) We created|cattle|and men|many

translations.1: Linuhyiya bihee baldatan maitanw-wa nusqiyahoo mimmaa khalaqnaaa an'aamanw Wa-anaasiyya katheeraa
translations.2: Linuhyiya bihi baldatan maytan wanusqiyahu mimma khalaqna anAAaman waanasiyya katheeran

words.translation: And verily|We have distributed it|among them|that they may remember|but refuse|most|(of) the people|except|disbelief

translations.1: Wa-laqad sarrafnaahu bainahum li-yazzakkaroo fa-abaaa aksarun naasi illaa kufooraa
translations.2: Walaqad sarrafnahu baynahum liyaththakkaroo faaba aktharu alnnasi illa kufooran

words.translation: And if|We willed|surely We (would) have raised|in|every|town|a warner

translations.1: Wa-law shi'naa laba'asnaa fee kulli qaryatin nazeeraa
translations.2: Walaw shina labaAAathna fee kulli qaryatin natheeran

words.translation: So (do) not|obey|the disbelievers|and strive (against) them|with it|a striving|great

translations.1: Falaa tuti'il kaafireena Wa-jaahidhum bihee jihaadan kabeeraa
translations.2: Fala tutiAAi alkafireena wajahidhum bihi jihadan kabeeran

words.translation: And He|(is) the One Who|(has) released|the two seas|[this] (one)|palatable|and sweet|and [this] (one)|salty|(and) bitter|and He has made|between them|a barrier|and a partition|forbidden

translations.1: Wa-Huwal lazee marajal bahraini haazaa 'azbun furaatunw Wa-haazaa milhun ujaaj; Wa-ja'ala bainahumaa barzakhanw Wa-hijran mahjooraa
translations.2: Wahuwa allathee maraja albahrayni hatha AAathbun furatun wahatha milhun ojajun wajaAAala baynahuma barzakhan wahijran mahjooran

words.translation: And He|(is) the One Who|has created|from|the water|human being|and has made (for) him|blood relationship|and marriage relationship|And is|your Lord|All-Powerful

translations.1: Wa-Huwal lazee khalaqa minal maaa'i basharan fa-ja'alahoo nasaban Wa-sihraa; Wa-kaana Rabbuka Qadeeraa
translations.2: Wahuwa allathee khalaqa mina almai basharan fajaAAalahu nasaban wasihran wakana rabbuka qadeeran

words.translation: But they worship|besides Allah|besides Allah|besides Allah|what|not profits them|not profits them|and not|harms them|and is|the disbeliever|against|his Lord|a helper

translations.1: Wa-ya'budoona min doonil laahi maa laa yanfa'uhum Wa-laa yadurruhum; Wa-kaanal kaafiru 'alaa Rabbihee zaheeraa
translations.2: WayaAAbudoona min dooni Allahi ma la yanfaAAuhum wala yadurruhum wakana alkafiru AAala rabbihi thaheeran

words.translation: And not|We sent you|except|(as) a bearer of glad tidings|and a warner

translations.1: Wa-maa arsalnaaka illaa mubashshiranw Wa-nazeeraa
translations.2: Wama arsalnaka illa mubashshiran wanatheeran

words.translation: Say|Not|I ask (of) you|for it|any|payment|except|(that) whoever wills|(that) whoever wills|to|take|to|his Lord|a way

translations.1: Qul maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin illaa man shaaa'a ai yattakhiza ilaa Rabbihee sabeelaa
translations.2: Qul ma asalukum AAalayhi min ajrin illa man shaa an yattakhitha ila rabbihi sabeelan

words.translation: And put your trust|in|the Ever-Living|the One Who|does not die|does not die|and glorify|with His Praise|And sufficient is|He|regarding the sins|(of) His slaves|All-Aware

translations.1: Wa-tawakkal 'alal Haiyil lazee laa yamootu Wa-sabbih bihamdih; Wa-kafaa bihee bizunoobi 'ibaadihee khabeeraa
translations.2: Watawakkal AAala alhayyi allathee la yamootu wasabbih bihamdihi wakafa bihi bithunoobi AAibadihi khabeeran

words.translation: The One Who|created|the heavens|and the earth|and whatever|(is) between them|in|six|periods|then|He established Himself|over|the Throne|the Most Gracious|so ask|Him|(as He is) All-Aware

translations.1: Allazee khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaa fee sittati aiyaamin thumma stawaa 'alal 'Arsh; ar-Rahmaanu fas'al bihee khabeeraa
translations.2: Allathee khalaqa alssamawati waalarda wama baynahuma fee sittati ayyamin thumma istawa AAala alAAarshi alrrahmanu faisal bihi khabeeran

words.translation: And when|it is said|to them|Prostrate|to the Most Gracious|They say|And what|(is) the Most Gracious|Should we prostrate|to what|you order us|And it increases them|(in) aversion

translations.1: Wa-izaa qeela lahumus judoo lir-Rahmaani qaaloo Wa-mar Rahmaanu 'a-nasjudu limaa ta'murunaa Wa-zaadahum nufooraa
translations.2: Waitha qeela lahumu osjudoo lilrrahmani qaloo wama alrrahmanu anasjudu lima tamuruna wazadahum nufooran

words.translation: Blessed is He|Who|has placed|in|the skies|constellations|and has placed|therein|a lamp|and a moon|shining

translations.1: Tabaarakal lazee ja'ala fis samaaa'i buroojanw Wa-ja'ala feehaa siraajanw Wa-qamaran muneeraa
translations.2: Tabaraka allathee jaAAala fee alssamai buroojan wajaAAala feeha sirajan waqamaran muneeran

words.translation: And He|(is) the One Who|made|the night|and the day|(in) succession|for whoever|desires|to|remember|or|desires|to be thankful

translations.1: Wa-huwal lazee ja'alal laila wannahaara khilfatan liman araada 'any yazzakkara aw araadaa shukooraa
translations.2: Wahuwa allathee jaAAala allayla waalnnahara khilfatan liman arada an yaththakkara aw arada shukooran

words.translation: And (the) slaves|(of) the Most Gracious|(are) those who|walk|on|the earth|(in) humbleness|and when|address them|the ignorant ones|they say|Peace

translations.1: Wa-'ibaadur Rahmaanil lazeena yamshoona 'alal ardi hawnanw Wa-izaa khaata-bahumul jaahiloona qaaloo salaamaa
translations.2: WaAAibadu alrrahmani allatheena yamshoona AAala alardi hawnan waitha khatabahumu aljahiloona qaloo salaman

words.translation: And those who|spend (the) night|before their Lord|prostrating|and standing

translations.1: Wallazeena yabeetoona li-Rabbihim sujjadanw Wa-qiyaamaa
translations.2: Waallatheena yabeetoona lirabbihim sujjadan waqiyaman

words.translation: And those who|say|Our Lord!|Avert|from us|the punishment|(of) Hell|Indeed|its punishment|is|inseparable

translations.1: Wallazeena yaqooloona Rabbanas rif 'annaa 'azaaba Jahannama inna 'azaabahaa kaana gharaamaa
translations.2: Waallatheena yaqooloona rabbana isrif AAanna AAathaba jahannama inna AAathabaha kana gharaman

words.translation: Indeed it|(is) an evil|abode|and resting place

translations.1: Innahaa saaa'at mustaqarranw Wa-muqaamaa
translations.2: Innaha saat mustaqarran wamuqaman

words.translation: And those who|when|they spend|(are) not extravagant|(are) not extravagant|and are not stingy|and are not stingy|but are|between|that|moderate

translations.1: Wallazeena izaaa anfaqoo lam yusrifoo Wa-lam yaqturoo Wa-kaana baina zaalika qawaamaa
translations.2: Waallatheena itha anfaqoo lam yusrifoo walam yaqturoo wakana bayna thalika qawaman

words.translation: And those who|(do) not|invoke|with|Allah|god|another|and (do) not|[they] kill|the soul|which|Allah has forbidden|Allah has forbidden|except|by right|and (do) not|commit adultery|And whoever|does|that|will meet|a penalty

translations.1: Wallazeena laa yad'oona ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara Wa-laa yaqtuloonan nafsal latee harramal laahu illaa bilhaqqi Wa-laa yaznoon; Wa-mai yaf'al zaalika yalqa 'athaamaa
translations.2: Waallatheena la yadAAoona maAAa Allahi ilahan akhara wala yaqtuloona alnnafsa allatee harrama Allahu illa bialhaqqi wala yaznoona waman yafAAal thalika yalqa athaman

words.translation: Will be doubled|for him|the punishment|(on the) Day|(of) Resurrection|and he will abide forever|therein|humiliated

translations.1: Yudaa'af lahul 'azaabu Yawmal Qiyaamati Wa-yakhlud feehee muhaanaa
translations.2: YudaAAaf lahu alAAathabu yawma alqiyamati wayakhlud feehi muhanan

words.translation: Except|(he) who|repents|and believes|and does|righteous deeds|righteous deeds|then (for) those|Allah will replace|Allah will replace|their evil deeds|(with) good ones|And is|Allah|Oft-Forgiving|Most Merciful

translations.1: Illaa man taaba Wa-'aamana Wa-'amila 'amalan saalihan fa-ulaaa'ika yubad-dilul laahu saiyyi-aatihim hasanaat; Wa-kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheemaa
translations.2: Illa man taba waamana waAAamila AAamalan salihan faolaika yubaddilu Allahu sayyiatihim hasanatin wakana Allahu ghafooran raheeman

words.translation: And whoever|repents|and does|righteous (deeds)|then indeed he|turns|to|Allah|(with) repentance

translations.1: Wa-man taaba Wa-'amila saalihan fa-innahoo yatoobu ilal laahi mataabaa
translations.2: Waman taba waAAamila salihan fainnahu yatoobu ila Allahi mataban

words.translation: And those who|(do) not|bear witness|(to) the falsehood|and when|they pass|by futility|they pass|(as) dignified ones

translations.1: Wallazeena laa yash-hadoonaz zoora Wa-izaa marroo billaghwi marroo kiraamaa
translations.2: Waallatheena la yashhadoona alzzoora waitha marroo biallaghwi marroo kiraman

words.translation: And those who|when|they are reminded|of (the) Verses|(of) their Lord|(do) not|fall|upon them|deaf|and blind

translations.1: Wallazeena izaa zukkiroo bi-Aayaati Rabbihim lam yakhirroo 'alaihaa summanw wa'umyaanaa
translations.2: Waallatheena itha thukkiroo biayati rabbihim lam yakhirroo AAalayha summan waAAumyanan

words.translation: And those who|say|Our Lord!|Grant|to us|from|our spouses|and our offspring|comfort|(to) our eyes|and make us|for the righteous|a leader

translations.1: Wallazeena yaqooloona Rabbanaa hab lanaa min azwaajinaa Wa-zurriyaatinaa qurrata a'yuninw waj-'alnaa lilmuttaqeena Imaamaa
translations.2: Waallatheena yaqooloona rabbana hab lana min azwajina wathurriyyatina qurrata aAAyunin waijAAalna lilmuttaqeena imaman

words.translation: Those|will be awarded|the Chamber|because|they were patient|and they will be met|therein|(with) greetings|and peace

translations.1: Ulaaa'ika yujzawnal ghurfata bimaa sabaroo Wa-yulaqqawna feehaa tahiyyatanw Wa-salaamaa
translations.2: Olaika yujzawna alghurfata bima sabaroo wayulaqqawna feeha tahiyyatan wasalaman

words.translation: Will abide forever|in it|Good|(is) the settlement|and a resting place

translations.1: Khaalideena feehaa; hasunat mustaqarranw Wa-muqaamaa
translations.2: Khalideena feeha hasunat mustaqarran wamuqaman

words.translation: Say|Not|will care|for you|my Lord|if not|your prayer (is to Him)|But verily|you have denied|so soon|will be|the inevitable (punishment)

translations.1: Qul maa ya'ba'u bikum Rabbee law-laa du'aaa'ukum faqad kazzabtum fasawfa yakoonu lizaamaa
translations.2: Qul ma yaAAbao bikum rabbee lawla duAAaokum faqad kaththabtum fasawfa yakoonu lizaman
